channel.title: ReverseEngineering on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in ReverseEngineering on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: [Part 1] Creating a safe (and functional) RE environment on Apple Silicon - VMWare Fusion
item.description: This blog post will guide you through the key programs and downloads required to successfully set up a functional and safe malware environment on M series MacBooks using VMWare Fusion.

item.title: You make me WannaSmile
item.description: Analysis of ‘WannaSmile’ ransomware using dnSpy to pull apart and understand the behaviour and crypto functions used by this binary to encrypt machines.

item.title: 0xCC Conference
item.description: I was lucky enough to be in a position to attend 0xCC this year, run by women, for women in tech. This is a collection of my thoughts and feelings about the value this conference had in my career.
